snippet.title: Yoshitaka Amano Artwork Trailer - Child of Light [UK]
snippet.description:
Discover how Yoshitaka Amano contributed to Child of Light by creating this amazing artwork! Get an A2 poster of the artwork in the Child of Light Deluxe Edition!

http://childoflight-game.com/
